Question
========
The file contains the final exam scores of high school students attending Raayland College concerning three of the courses studied. What is the mean score on the final history exam (variable: history) for boys [Gender = 2]? Write your answer in the answer box (with 3 decimal places).

**Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-256-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-256-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 4.736.
